dr.evolution.tree
Class CladeSet

java.lang.Object
  dr.util.FrequencySet<java.util.BitSet>
      dr.evolution.tree.CladeSet

public class CladeSet
extends FrequencySet<java.util.BitSet>

Stores a set of unique clades (and their node heights) for a tree

Version:
$Id: CladeSet.java,v 1.8 2005/05/24 20:25:56 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
